title: Jason Cammisa
description:
Jason Cammisa is the former co-host of the mega-popular online 
 Motor Trend show, "HEAD2HEAD", and young veteran of the automotive world, having written for Road&Track, Automobile, and Motor Trend. He owns several awesome "enthusiast" cars and has a lot of wisdom. We also do a very long Q&A sessions with the fans. 

This show is also a video, with clips and photos paired to the discussion: https://youtu.be/LaYqhNImKgM

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @jasoncammisa
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @jasoncammisa
 
Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
